title: Programming & Scripting
summary: Python, Bash/Shell, PowerShell, C/C++, JavaScript/TypeScript; Git workflows. Python tooling across data scraping, automation, testing, and ML/DS libraries.

title: Data Engineering & MLOps
summary: Apache Airflow DAG design/orchestration, ETL pipelines, data quality checks, schema/versioning patterns, REST API integration, monitoring and dashboards (Grafana/Prometheus).

title: Machine Learning & Computer Vision
summary: Model implementation and optimisation (YOLO, ResNet), neural networks, feature engineering, clustering/classification workflows, image processing and similarity analysis; GPU deployment with TensorRT.

title: DevOps & Cloud Tooling
summary: Docker/Compose, CI/CD workflows, Linux administration, AWS services (EC2, S3, Lambda, IAM), infrastructure and reliability tooling; general security/compliance awareness.

title: Frontend & Visualisation
summary: React, Next.js, Vue, D3, Three.js and GSAP animations; responsive UI and dashboard design; TailwindCSS; WordPress/Elementor for rapid marketing sites.

title: Embedded & Electrical Engineering
summary: Circuit design and simulation, embedded systems (Arduino, Raspberry Pi, ESP8266), sensor integration, power electronics, PCB design/layout, and measurement/test equipment interfacing.

title: Professional & Interpersonal
summary: Analytical problem-solving, root cause analysis, clear technical writing/storytelling, Agile/Scrum teamwork, project/time management, and leadership/resilience.
